an3.46:1.1: “Yaṃ, bhikkhave, sīlavanto pabbajitā gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā upanissāya viharanti.
an3.46:1.2: Tattha manussā tīhi ṭhānehi bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavanti.
an3.46:1.5: Yaṃ, bhikkhave, sīlavanto pabbajitā gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā upanissāya viharanti.
an3.46:1.6: Tattha manussā imehi tīhi ṭhānehi bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavantī”ti.
